assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Solution Dynamics Limited provides customer communication solutions in New Zealand, Australia, Europe, and the United States. The company offers advanced digital asset management solutions, which combine a central repository to store, manage, and access brand assets, as well as associated accurate brand and product information together with integrated publishing applications; and communications content generation solutions, such as communication content generation workflows, digital asset and smart document ingestion, smart template ingestion, advanced database driven templates, online preview, multi-language capabilities, approval workflows, and advanced user rights management. It also provides automated workflows for communications personalization; content personalization and automated workflows for printed mail, email, and SMS; smart document and data driven templates; online preview and approval workflows; automated workflows for dispatch of personalized communications; automated workflows to effect print and mail house services; and access to print and mail house, database cleansing workflow, and bulk mail rates. In addition, the company offers communication logistics solutions comprising outbound and inbound communications management, high volume document scanning and data capture, conversion of file from paper to digital and bulk ingestion, meta-data tagging automation, managing sensitive and time critical documents, and outsourced digital archiving and document management; and post on demand solutions, such as access to self-service online portal. Further, it provides print management, mail house and fulfilment, direct and transactional marketing, communications database cleansing, document and financial management, and business process and IT consultancy services, as well as communications software. Solution Dynamics Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.
